insight: **Network Quality Churn Insight:** This high-value customer ($4592 CLTV) churned despite subscribing to Operator B (Champion)'s premium "Infinite Plus" plan due to network issues in Rural Texas. They likely switched to Operator T's "Go5G Next" which offers better network coverage in rural areas.
